main event: On 29 August 1968, a witness observed countless unidentified objects of different sizes moving in the sky for about 3 minutes in Miamisburg, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes while the observer was stargazing., The objects were noted to be of countless variations in size., The color of the moving light was described as slightly red-orange., The observation was conducted with the naked eye without any special equipment., The conclusion from the investigation suggested it was probable that the objects were aircraft.
witness description: William L. Buie, a 15-year-old male student.
